sentence.Network_en: The prevailing conditions in activated sludge may even promote the hatching of some helminth eggs.
sentence.Network_cn: 在活性污泥中,适宜的条件甚至可能刺激一些蠕虫卵的孵化.

sentence.Network_en: In addition, still checked other helminth in ground test piece egg.
sentence.Network_cn: 此外, 在土样中还查到了其它寄生虫卵.

sentence.Network_en: Trichomonad is helminth, have certain infectivity.
sentence.Network_cn: 滴虫是寄生虫, 具有一定的传染性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Greek helmins, helminth- 'intestinal worm'

means.word_mean: 1. worm that is parasitic on the intestines of vertebrates especially roundworms and tapeworms and flukes
